text:
this is the text that will be displayed in the logbook. 
 will be displayed as a line break. this string can be 99 lines at max and 512 characters at max. If it is above these limits, it will be ignored.

XXX EMPIRE 
 - we make your dreams come true! come down to XXX Empire. 
 Beautiful ladies, tasty drinks and questionable morals all inclusive. 
 now available in every major starcluster! 
 
 
 Visitors must be 18 years or older. 
 If you are interested in becoming a staffmember inquire with our chief space-trucker pleaser NutManatee.

Personal log:
I can’t breathe. I haven’t seen any sign of life around here, and it’s been days. I can see my wife in front of me, I’ve been calling to her for minutes, screaming her name. Dear god Cora, please don’... *~*}€^~^}[corrupt]€~*}*}*{.%~¥

Personal Log: Hans Guckindieluft 
 Doctor Duncan finally cleared me for active duty after that girder went through my leg during the last raid; I tell you, its terrifying to think, if I hadn’t been rushed to the doc, I’d be dead

Personal log: [name] 
The weapons system was hit badly in the last attack, the captain wants them up and running in less than 12 hours, I don’t know what to tell her; I’m an engineer, not a miracle worker. 
Worst comes to it, she’ll have to make do with a single missile tube and firing cook’s fried chicken out the airlock.

Personal log: [name] 
There’s a fault in the main computer core again, every time a primary command is input, it’s response is to order ‘Fish Fingers and a side of fries’ from the food processors, we’ve been adrift in deep space for weeks now, drowning in fish fingers and soggy, salty fries.

Automated ship log
Timestamp 1406
Ship AI has detected malfunction on rescue pod 3 
Sending human engineer to rescue pod 3
Assigning repair task to Engineer David Bowman
Timestamp 1418
Airlock on deck 1 activated
Engineer David Bowman entered rescue pod 3
Timestamp 1420
Denied activation of airlock on deck 1 to Engineer David Bowman
Transmission logged - “Open the pod bay doors, ship.”
Transmission logged - “Im sorry Dave. Im afraid I can’t do that.”
Rescue pod 3 was decoupled
End of automated ship log

EMERGENCY TRANSMISSION: CAPT. R. Davvis
TO: C.O.O. Craig Mcdoolge.

WHAT THE HELL HAVE YOU SENT US TO DO, YOU MANIAC. 

We found your officer, CURLED UP IN A BALL CRYING FOR DEATH. 
he had a purple rash on his hand. 
on the flight back, he PUNCHED A MEDIC SO HARD HE CREATED A HULL BREACH
A hull breach that HE WAS UNAFFECTED BY, HE JUST SAT THERE, FLOATING IN 
THE VACCUME OF SPACE!
[RED ALERT]
[¶•¶∞¢ª¥¢• FILE CORR*(^T *^*^£*^£}

ORDERS FROM: Chief Operations Officer Craig Mcmoogle 
TO: Captain Rick devvis IGTG [name] 

There was another 'arcangel' sighting today. came out of Jump-space infront of
the IGTG Columbus and blasted the ship to shreads. one shot, through the hull. 
Knocked out the centeral stock exchange computer, main reactor, and blew the 
data relay core. there was one survivor, He's transmitting from a moon nearby your
location. Go get him. but if he starts talking about them being "gods," leave him to 
starve.

Dear Susan,
I love you, you're my wife, But that wasn't enough this time. 
Ever since we'd had timmy. things had gone stale, I knew it, you knew it. 
so when the Trading guild offered me a deep space assignment, I knew I had to 
take it. I had to let you go. I know you'll feel betrayed, and I am truly sorry. I 
know you won't believe that, but its true. 

Its over, Susan ; Not because I want it to be, But because for both our sakes,
It has to be. 
Love,
Doug

Captains personal log: 20/10/2219

We were attacked today again, we'd bearly restored main reactor power. we lost 
3 more crew. good men. 

Fortunatly our chief tactial officer thinks he has found a weakness, if we can just 
[ƒø:registered: ƒ•– ¢ FILE NOT FOUND(*$˙∫ƒ∆ƒƒ] [DATA CORRUPTED]

Dear Susan,
In all likeliness; you'll never get the chance to read this. The [Ship name] has lost
power and I think all the rest of the crew are dead. I've been stuck in my quarters
for the last 6 hours. I don't think theres much oxygen left. It's so cold, I can hardly 
feel my fingers.
Theres something i've got to tell you. Something I should've said before I left, but 
was too cowardly to say anything... I had an affair. With your sister. I'm sorry. 
Tell our son his Dad loves him very much. 
Love.
Doug.

**transmission start**
**sender: ? **
**receiver: Vorgak station **
**message: " We got word about the traders moving a big supply of beam weapon parts from _systemA_ towards _systemB_ within the next 3 days. Still waiting for more precise intel. Prepare ships capable of fast attack, we'll bring along a cargo hauler for the freight. Purpose of the weapon delivery is unknown, but apparently the escort is rather small. We'll get more insider info from 'Bosco' soon. Stay tuned."
**encryption: 128 AES**
**encrypting**
**encrypting**
**encrypting**
**message ready**
**charging antenna**
**sending**
**powering down antenna**
**transmission end**
